name: Farmed & Dangerous
description: Welcome to Farmed & Dangerous, the competitive farming game that pits you against a rival farmer in an all out, produce-lobbing food war! Customize your farm with 10 different types of crops, each with a unique ability! Purchase seeds, grow crops, and destroy your opponent's farm with your own assortment of explosive fruits and vegetables! Play locally against a friend and see whose farm will reign victorious!
